AlenkaF commented on pull request #12588: URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12588#issuecomment-1068904978 To me it looks like in case the strategy selects a timestamp that is out of range (for example `datetime.datetime(1677, 9, 21, 1, 34, 43)`, out-of-bounds error is raised. I can't find any info about the timestamp range in the docs though. Will try to set the limit to the strategy to see if that is actually the problem.

fields.summary: [Ci][Python] Nightly hypothesis build is not actually running the hypothesis tests
